long_description: The men's NRS H2Core(TM) Long-Sleeve Rashguard breathes freely, wicks moisture and protects skin from abrasion when you're paddling, surfing or rafting. Fabric wicks moisture away from the skin, breathes freely and dries quickly for cool comfort on the water; UPF 45 sun protection. The silky exterior ensures fluid, athletic performance while the brushed inner surface feels soft and cool on your skin. Performance cut allows unrestricted movement and creates friction-free zones under the arms for comfortable paddling.
short_description: The men's NRS H2Core(TM) Long-Sleeve Rashguard breathes freely, wicks moisture and protects skin from abrasion when you're paddling, surfing or rafting.
